EmailTemplate.subject: 60% of U.S. Consumers Want Personalized Financial Advice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It’s a critical time to get personalization right, especially with nearly half of U.S. consumers willing to switch to a different primary FI that could better anticipate their needs.*
And with more consumers than ever now embracing the digital channel, there’s no time to lose.
We can help you deliver a successful omnichannel banking experience where personalization is a priority.
Want to learn more about what you heard in our recent webinar <[[https://thefinancialbrand.com/webinars/omnichannel-confidential-defining-digital-first-in-todays-world-ncr-webinar/]]>, Omnichannel Confidential: Defining Digital-First in Today’s World? <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/smb-business-banking/april-financial-brand-webinar?email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> *The survey was conducted online by The Harris Poll on behalf of NCR from February 4-8, 2021, among 2,007 U.S. banking consumers (defined as those who have a primary financial institution) age 18 and older.
